title: Bouncer: Wristbands
instructions:
You're still working as a bouncer, but now the venue has a wristband system. Different age groups get different colored wristbands.

You have these functions:
- `get_age()` returns the age of the person waiting outside
- `child_wristband()` gives them a child wristband (under 13)
- `teen_wristband()` gives them a teen wristband (13 to 17)
- `adult_wristband()` gives them an adult wristband (18 to 64)
- `senior_wristband()` gives them a senior wristband (65 and over)

Get the person's age and give them the correct wristband!
hints: Start by storing the age in a variable: set age to get_age()
Use if/else if/else to check the age ranges in order
Check the youngest group first (age < 13), then work upwards
The last group (seniors) doesn't need a condition â€” use else
